name: Terraform, tflint, and TFGrunt
description: Installs the Terraform CLI and optionally Terragrunt and TFLint. Auto-detects latest version and installs needed dependencies.

installTerragrunt.description: Install Terragrunt, a thin wrapper for Terraform that provides extra tools for working with multiple Terraform modules

installSentinel.description: Install sentinel, a language and framework for policy built to be embedded in existing software to enable fine-grained, logic-based policy decisions

installTFsec.description: Install tfsec, a tool to spot potential misconfigurations for your terraform code

installTerraformDocs.description: Install terraform-docs, a utility to generate documentation from Terraform modules

httpProxy.description: Connect to a keyserver using a proxy by configuring this option
